page.title: 05Employment in N.W.Guildford
page.content: In our area there is more {industrial}than agricultural work available, though it used to be the reverse. The south-eastern part of the area has the most concentrated employment. The main employers are Hestair Dennis, the Borough Council, and shops and offices. More women than men have part-time jobs. We surveyed a sample of 108 school families with these results: Of the{fathers}43.5% are manual workers, 39.8% professional people and 11.1% work in service jobs. 4.6% are self-employed and 1% are unemployed. The largest groups of manual and non-manual workers were engineers 18.5%, and managers/directors 21.3%. Of the{mothers,}74% do not have a job, while 26% have, with office workers being the largest group at 13.6%.
